response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which represents a significant discount compared to its market value.

Considering the product's worth to you is $1,000,000, this offer presents a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a favorable price. We understand the importance of making informed decisions, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information about the product.

Should you choose to proceed with this offer, we guarantee a seamless transaction process and outstanding customer service. If you decide to reject this offer, I kindly inform you that the product will be made available to another interested party, Mr. John, who is willing to purchase it at its full value of $1,200,000.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
